name: MEC Stem (7 Degree x 26.0mm)
description: Aluminum stem for older steel bikes with 26.0mm tubing.3D forged aluminum construction is light, durable and economical.4 bolt handlebar design provides a solid and secure attachment.2 bolt fork design ensures straight and secure clamping.Upward position reduces neck strain and relaxes your position.Downward position makes your posture more agressive.
